title: Katy 4 WEEKS FREE UPFRONT
posting_body: For leasing information call or text
Our community offers beautifully appointed one, two and three bedroom floor plans.
The kitchens feature stainless steel appliances and an open bar area that is perfect for entertaining.

Our luxury apartments include lavish amenities such as our 24 hour athletic center, ultra-luxe leisure and lap pool, paw spa, outdoor verandas and cabanas with gas grills, automated package lockers & cold  storage.
42" upper cabinetry with brushed nickel accents
Chef inspired kitchen with under-mount sink and subway tile backsplash
Convenient resident portal for payments, communication, and requests
iMac cyber lounge and complimentary Wi-Fi in common areas
Island with wine rack and conversational seating (select plans)
Luxurious bathrooms with custom framed mirrors
Multimedia executive conference center with catering kitchen
Open plans with 9'-12' ceilings (varies by floor level/plan)
